Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of pale-red pottery wine-jar, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393107) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393107)
